data.title: PID Controller
data.description: Measure → Calculate Error → Apply Correction → Loop

data.title: Theory of Constraints
data.description: Identify Constraint → Exploit → Subordinate → Elevate → Loop

data.title: The Flywheel Effect
data.description: Applied Effort → Build Momentum → Breakthrough → Reduced Effort → Loop

data.title: Kaizen
data.description: Standardize → Measure → Compare → Innovate → Standardize (Loop)

data.title: The Habit Loop
data.description: Cue (Trigger) → Routine (Behavior) → Reward → Craving (Loop)

data.title: Positive Feedback
data.description: Event A → Produces B → Amplifies A → Exponential Growth

data.title: Negative Feedback
data.description: Event A → Produces B → Reduces A → Stability

data.title: The Hook Model
data.description: Trigger → Action → Variable Reward → Investment → Trigger (Loop)

data.title: Boyd's E-M Theory
data.description: Energy State → Trade for Position/Speed → Regain Energy → Loop

data.title: Triple-Loop Learning
data.description: Result → Action (Single) → Assumptions (Double) → Identity (Triple)

data.title: Effectuation
data.description: Means → Affordable Loss → Contingencies → New Means → Loop

data.title: Decision Tree
data.description: Node → Branch A (Prob X) / Branch B (Prob Y) → Outcome → Value

data.title: Binary Search
data.description: Sort List → Pick Middle → Target < Middle? (Left) : Target > Middle? (Right)

data.title: Minimax Algorithm
data.description: Look Ahead → Maximize My Gain → Minimize Opponent Gain → Select

data.title: Fault Tree Analysis
data.description: Undesired Event → Logic Gate (OR/AND) → Lower Events → Root Causes

data.title: Event Tree Analysis
data.description: Initiating Event → System A Works? (Yes/No) → System B Works? (Yes/No) → Consequence

data.title: START Triage
data.description: Walking? (Green) → Breathing? (No=Black/Yes=Red) → Pulse? (Red) → Cap Refill?

data.title: Genetic Algorithm
data.description: Init Pop → Evaluate Fitness → Select → Crossover/Mutate → New Gen → Loop

data.title: Monte Carlo Sim
data.description: Define Domain → Generate Random Inputs → Loop x10k → Aggregate → Probability

data.title: If-Then-Else
data.description: Condition Met? → True Path ↔ Condition Failed? → False Path

data.title: Switch/Case
data.description: Input Variable → Case 1? → Case 2? → Case 3? → Default

data.title: Recursion
data.description: Function Call → Base Case Met? (Return) : Loop Deeper (Call Self)

data.title: STRIDE
data.description: Inspect Flow → Branch: Spoofing? Tampering? Repudiation? Info Disclosure? DoS?

data.title: Spiral Model
data.description: Objectives → Risks → Develop/Test → Plan Next → Loop (Expand)

data.title: Hermeneutic Circle
data.description: Understand Part → Understand Whole → Re-interpret Part → Re-interpret Whole → Loop

data.title: Bayesian Updating
data.description: Prior Belief → New Evidence → Likelihood → Posterior Belief (New Prior) → Loop

data.title: Design Sprint
data.description: Map (Mon) → Sketch (Tue) → Decide (Wed) → Prototype (Thu) → Test (Fri)

data.title: Gartner Hype Cycle
data.description: Trigger → Peak Expectations → Trough Disillusionment → Slope Enlightenment → Plateau

data.title: Product Life Cycle
data.description: Intro → Growth → Maturity → Saturation → Decline → Extension/Death

data.title: Transtheoretical Model
data.description: Pre-contemplation → Contemplation → Preparation → Action → Maintenance → Relapse (Loop)

data.title: Kolb's Learning
data.description: Experience → Reflection → Conceptualization → Experimentation → Loop

data.title: Gibbs' Cycle
data.description: Description → Feelings → Evaluation → Analysis → Action Plan → Loop

data.title: Newton-Raphson
data.description: Guess Root → Calculate Tangent → Find Intercept → New Guess → Loop

data.title: Growth Hacking
data.description: Analyze Data → Ideate → Prioritize (ICE) → Test → Analyze → Loop

data.title: The 'V' Model
data.description: Reqs (Down) → Design (Down) → Code → Unit Test (Up) → System Test (Up)

data.title: RACI Matrix
data.description: Task → Responsible? → Accountable? → Consulted? → Informed?

data.title: Situational Leadership
data.description: Diagnose Level → Directing? → Coaching? → Supporting? → Delegating?

data.title: Cynefin (Logic)
data.description: Simple (Categorize) → Complicated (Analyze) → Complex (Probe) → Chaotic (Act)

data.title: Swiss Cheese Model
data.description: Hazard → Layer 1 (Hole?) → Layer 2 (Hole?) → Layer 3 (Hole?) → Accident

data.title: Balanced Scorecard
data.description: Financial ↔ Customer ↔ Internal Process ↔ Learning/Growth (Loop)

data.title: McKinsey 7S
data.description: Strategy ↔ Structure ↔ Systems ↔ Shared Values ↔ Style ↔ Staff ↔ Skills

data.title: Critical Path Method
data.description: List Tasks → Define Dependencies → Calculate Longest Path → Identify Float

data.title: PERT
data.description: Task → (Optimistic + 4*Likely + Pessimistic) / 6 → Weighted Avg

data.title: 5S System
data.description: Sort → Set in Order → Shine → Standardize → Sustain (Loop)

data.title: MapReduce
data.description: Map (Split/Parallel) → Shuffle (Sort) → Reduce (Aggregate)

data.title: Git Flow
data.description: Main → Develop → Feature Branch (Loop) → Release → Merge Main

data.title: Hegelian Dialectic
data.description: Thesis → Antithesis (Conflict) → Synthesis (Resolution) → Loop

data.title: The Work
data.description: Is it true? → Can you know? → Reaction? → Who without thought? → Turnaround

data.title: Flow State Cycle
data.description: Struggle (Load) → Release (Disengage) → Flow (Peak) → Recovery → Loop

data.title: Maslow's Hierarchy
data.description: Physio Met? → Safety Met? → Love Met? → Esteem Met? → Self-Act

data.title: ABCDE Model
data.description: Activating Event → Belief → Consequence → Disputation → Effect

data.title: WOOP
data.description: Wish → Outcome → Obstacle → Plan (If Obstacle -> Then Action)

data.title: Kübler-Ross Loop
data.description: Denial → Anger → Bargaining → Depression → Acceptance

data.title: Self-Fulfilling Prophecy
data.description: Belief → Action → Impact Others → Others' Belief → Others' Action → Reinforce

data.title: Imposter Syndrome
data.description: Task → Anxiety → Over-prep/Procrastinate → Success → Discount → Loop

data.title: ETL Process
data.description: Extract (Source) → Transform (Clean) → Load (Warehouse) → Analyze

data.title: Saga Pattern
data.description: Service A → Success? (Next) : Fail? (Compensate A/Undo)

data.title: Red-Green-Refactor
data.description: Write Red Test (Fail) → Write Code (Pass) → Refactor → Loop

data.title: Chaos Engineering
data.description: Steady State → Introduce Turbulence → Observe System → Improve → Loop

data.title: Pub/Sub
data.description: Publisher → Message → Topic → Subscriber A (Parallel) / Subscriber B (Parallel)

data.description: User Action → Controller → Model Update → View Update → User
